spirit:field.spirit:name: Enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Master enable for the device interrupt output to the system interrupt controller: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CHAN0_INT_ST
spirit:field.spirit:description: Channel 0 (ap_done) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 0 input interrupt, 1 = Channel 0 input interrup

spirit:field.spirit:name: CHAN1_INT_ST
spirit:field.spirit:description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 input interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 input interrup

spirit:field.spirit:name: src_rows
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bit 31 to 0 Data signal of src_rows

spirit:field.spirit:name: src_cols
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bit 31 to 0 Data signal of src_cols

spirit:field.spirit:name: dst_rows
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bit 31 to 0 Data signal of dst_rows

spirit:field.spirit:name: dst_cols
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bit 31 to 0 Data signal of dst_cols
